title: Suggestion: allow godoc pkg.name
body:
godoc will output the docs for a particular name (e.g., for a function) using
"godoc pkg name", e.g., godoc strings TrimSpace. But Go programmers are used
to writing strings.TrimSpace in their code so it would be nice if godoc could be a bit
smarter and if it gets a string in the form x.y it should try to treat x as a package
name and y as a function/other item name.
